name: Unstable Rocket (asdeph, YihSong)
description:
This rocket is extremely unstable just cannot go straight! Try to balance the rocket as long as possible and be careful not to crash! Made for Ludum Dare 49.

Controls:

A & D or Left & Right arrows to steer tail of rocket

Spacebar for Force Field

Power Ups:

- Orange: Speed increase for a certain duration

- Green: Add a life point (capped at 3)

- White: Walls become bouncy and do not destroy your spaceship

2D and 3D assets:

Self created and modeled by @asdeph

Credits:

Programmers:

@asdeph

@YihSong

2D and 3D artist:

@asdeph
